div.p: D63/9140, unit 749, VPRS 1189/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.
STATEMENT of the EXPENDITURE incurred upon Requisition by the GOVERNMENT STOREKEEPER for the Department of Botanic Gardens during the period from 1 January 1863, to 23 October 1863.

div.p: Note — Forage for the months of November & December (less one half allowance of Hay) has been included in the above Statement as requested in Dr. Mueller's letter of the 21st Inst.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p:
Melbourne, 23 October 1863.
See also M to J. McCulloch, 25 October 1863 (in this edition as 63-10-25b).
